text:
@realDonaldTrump Ahhh Donnie..Asian Americans are f*cking pissed off at HOW YOU,  the #RacistInChief and YOUR cult is ATTACKING THEM!

My God is there just ONE DAY you can talk about the devastation #COVID19 has had to families & those who have LOST LOVED ONES to it INSTEAD OF THE F*CKING BLAME😡
